alert.note: Alert for Benton; Polk (Oregon) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Portland (Northwest Oregon and Southwest Washington)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued December 21 at 1:51PM PST until December 22 at 3:40PM PST by NWS Portland
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Oregon... Marys River near Philomath affecting Benton County. Pudding River at Aurora affecting Clackamas and Marion Counties. ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Oregon... Luckiamute River near Suver affecting Polk and Benton Counties. For the Willamette River Tributaries...including Philomath, Suver, Aurora...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT THROUGH WEDNESDAY AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Luckiamute River near Suver. * WHEN...Until tomorrow afternoon. * IMPACTS...Above 27.0 feet, expect flooding of low lying and agricultural lands in the vicinity of Sarah Helmick State Park, Highway 99W, and Parker Road. Some secondary roads and rural access roads may be flooded at this point. Flooding along Buena Vista Rd near the confluence with the Willamette is also likely, especiallly if the Willamette is running high. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 1:30 PM PST Tuesday the stage was 28.0 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 1:31 PM PST Tuesday was 28.1 feet. - Forecast...The river is receding, and is expected to fall below flood stage tomorrow morning. - Flood stage is 27.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Caution is urged when walking near riverbanks. Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued this evening by 10 PM PST.
